name: Opa!City
description:
This is a local multiplayer game for 4 players, you'll need a controller for each player as well.

This game was made in the LAJES (Electronic Games and Systems Lab) program at PUCPR.

Made by five students, and overlooked by three teachers.

Students: Kaz Born (Artist), Paula Silva (Head Programmer), Luan Patrick (Programmer) and Arthur Felipe (Programmer), Leonardo Lima (Music and SFX).

Teacher: Artur Mittlebach (Mentor of the game), Bruno Campagnolo and Anderson Vermonde.
